Game.Name: Columns III (USA)
Game.plot: Columns has always been fun. But now that you can add TEAM PLAYER to COLUMNS III it's a party! With multiple playing modes, you can go one-on-one with a friend, mix it up in a simultaneous free-for-all, take on two players yourself, or for a real frenzy, go all out in four-player simultaneous or five-player simultaneous modes. Of course, if you wish, you can still play against the machine.
Game.Notes: Third game in the Columns series. In this fast-paced puzzle mayhem, your goal is to arrange three or more jewels of the same colour horizontally, vertically or diagonally to remove them from the playing screen. While the jewels are falling, you can change the order of their colours. In the Arcade, Versus, and Time Trial modes, you can test your skills against an opponent, a clock, or a specific task such as removing a particular jewel. New features include a rising bar that can be used to annoy opponents and magical items that have strategic value to alter the outcome mid-game.
